name: foundry-no-dice-no-stress
description: Removes the stress of rolling dice in vtt foundry

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/no-dice-no-cry-chrome dist/no-dice-no-cry-firefox && esbuild chrome-extension/background.ts --bundle --platform=browser --outdir=dist/no-dice-no-cry-chrome && esbuild firefox-extension/background.ts --bundle --platform=browser --outdir=dist/no-dice-no-cry-firefox && node scripts/update-manifests.js
